00061 void EnterIMPPersonalityFinish( void )
00062 {
00063 
00064       // reset states
00065       fCreateFinishOkButton = FALSE;
00066       bPersonalityEndState = 0;
00067       fConfirmIsYesFlag = FALSE;
00068 
00069       // create the buttons
00070       CreateIMPPersonalityFinishButtons( );
00071 
00072       return;
00073 }

00075 void RenderIMPPersonalityFinish( void )
00076 {
00077    // the background
00078       RenderProfileBackGround( );
00079 
00080             // indent for text
00081   RenderBeginIndent( 110, 93 );
00082 
00083       // check confirm flag to decide if we have to display appropriate response to button action
00084       if( fConfirmHasBeenSelectedFlag )
00085       {
00086             // confirm was yes, display yes string
00087             if(fConfirmIsYesFlag == TRUE)
00088             {
00089       // display yes string
00090                   PrintImpText( );
00091             }
00092             else
00093             {
00094                   // display no string
00095       PrintImpText( );
00096             }
00097       }
00098       return;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void ExitIMPPersonalityFinish( void )
00102 {
00103   
00104       // exit at IMP Ok button
00105       if( fExitIMPPerFinAtOk )
00106       {
00107             // destroy the finish ok buttons
00108         DestroyPersonalityFinishOkButton( );
00109       }
00110 
00111 
00112       if( ( fExitDueFrIMPPerFinToOkButton == FALSE ) &&( fExitIMPPerFinAtOk == FALSE ) )
00113       {
00114             // exit due to cancel button, not ok or Yes/no button
00115             // get rid of yes no
00116             DestroyIMPersonalityFinishButtons( );
00117       }
00118 
00119 
00120       fCreatedOkIMPButton = FALSE;
00121       fOkToReturnIMPMainPageFromPersonalityFlag = FALSE;
00122       fConfirmHasBeenSelectedFlag = FALSE;
00123       return;
00124 }

00127 void HandleIMPPersonalityFinish( void )
00128 {
00129   
00130       // check if confirm and delay
00131       CheckIfConfirmHasBeenSelectedAndTimeDelayHasPassed( );
00132 
00133 
00134   return;
00135 }

00137 
00138 void CheckIfConfirmHasBeenSelectedAndTimeDelayHasPassed( void )
00139 {
00140       // this function will check to see if player has in fact confirmed selection and delay to
00141       // read text has occurred
00142   
00143 
00144 
00145       // if not confirm selected, return
00146       if( fConfirmHasBeenSelectedFlag == FALSE )
00147       {
00148             return;
00149       }
00150 
00151       if( fCreateFinishOkButton == TRUE )
00152       {
00153             fCreateFinishOkButton = FALSE;
00154             CreatePersonalityFinishOkButton( );
00155             fCreatedOkIMPButton = TRUE;
00156       }
00157 
00158       // create ok button
00159       if( fCreatedOkIMPButton == FALSE )
00160       {
00161             DestroyIMPersonalityFinishButtons( );
00162             fCreateFinishOkButton = TRUE;
00163             fExitIMPPerFinAtOk = TRUE;
00164       }
00165 
00166       // ok to return
00167       if( fOkToReturnIMPMainPageFromPersonalityFlag == TRUE )
00168       {
00169             DestroyPersonalityFinishOkButton( );
00170             fCreatedOkIMPButton = FALSE;
00171             fOkToReturnIMPMainPageFromPersonalityFlag = FALSE;
00172             fConfirmHasBeenSelectedFlag = FALSE;
00173             fExitDueFrIMPPerFinToOkButton = TRUE;
00174       }
00175  
00176       return;
00177 }

00180 void CreateIMPPersonalityFinishButtons( void )
00181 {
00182   // this function will create the buttons needed for the IMP personality Finish Page
00183 
00184       // ths Yes button
00185   giIMPPersonalityFinishButtonImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_5.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );

00187                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,

00189 */

00191                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00192                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00193                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00194                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 90 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 224 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00195                                                                                           BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPPersonalityFinishYesCallback);

00200                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00201                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPPersonalityFinishNoCallback);
00202   */

00204                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00205                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW,

00208                                                                                           BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPPersonalityFinishNoCallback);
00209 
00210        SetButtonCursor(giIMPPersonalityFinishButton[0], CURSOR_WWW);
00211        SetButtonCursor(giIMPPersonalityFinishButton[1], CURSOR_WWW);
00212 
00213 
00214       return;

00218 void DestroyIMPersonalityFinishButtons( void )
00219 {
00220       // this function will destroy the buttons needed for the IMP personality Finish page
00221   
00222       // the yes button
00223   RemoveButton(giIMPPersonalityFinishButton[ 0 ] );
00224   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPPersonalityFinishButtonImage[ 0 ] );
00225 
00226   // the no button
00227       RemoveButton(giIMPPersonalityFinishButton[ 1 ] );
00228   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPPersonalityFinishButtonImage[ 1 ] );
00229 
00230       return;
00231 }

00233 
00234 void BtnIMPPersonalityFinishYesCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00235 {
00236 
00237       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00238       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00239             return;
00240 
00241       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00242       {
00243             // confirm flag set, get out of HERE!
00244          if( fConfirmHasBeenSelectedFlag )
00245              {
00246                    // now set this button off
00247        btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00248 
00249                    return;
00250              }
00251 
00252              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00253      
00254       }
00255       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00256       {
00257             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00258             {
00259       
00260               // now set this button off
00261       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00262 
00263                   // set fact yes was selected
00264               fConfirmIsYesFlag = TRUE;
00265 
00266                   // set fact that confirmation has been done
00267                   fConfirmHasBeenSelectedFlag = TRUE;
00268       
00269                   // now make skill, personality and attitude
00270                   CreatePlayersPersonalitySkillsAndAttitude( );
00271                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00272       bPersonalityEndState = 1;
00273             }
00274       }
00275 }
00276

00278 
00279 void BtnIMPPersonalityFinishNoCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00280 {
00281 
00282       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00283       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00284             return;
00285 
00286       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00287       {
00288      // confirm flag set, get out of HERE!
00289          if( fConfirmHasBeenSelectedFlag )
00290              {
00291                    // now set this button off
00292        btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00293 
00294                    return;
00295              }
00296 
00297              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00298      
00299       }
00300       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00301       {
00302             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00303             {
00304       
00305                   // now set this button on
00306       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00307 
00308                   // set fact yes was selected
00309               fConfirmIsYesFlag = FALSE;
00310 
00311                   // set fact that confirmation has been done
00312                   fConfirmHasBeenSelectedFlag = TRUE;
00313                   CreatePlayersPersonalitySkillsAndAttitude( );
00314                   
00315       bPersonalityEndState = 2;
00316                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00317             }
00318       }
00319 }

00350 
00351 void BtnIMPPersonalityFinishOkCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00352 {
00353 
00354       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00355       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00356             return;
00357 
00358       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00359       {
00360      
00361              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00362      
00363       }
00364       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00365       {
00366             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00367             {
00368                   // now set this button on
00369       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00370 
00371             // Testing UB stuff
00372             //    if( iCurrentProfileMode < 2 )
00373             //    {
00374             //          iCurrentProfileMode = 2;
00375             //    }
00376 
00377                   // button pending, wait a frame
00378                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00379                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00380 
00381 
00382                   if( iCurrentProfileMode != IMP__FINISH )
00383                   {
00384                         iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__ATTRIBUTES;
00385                   }
00386                   else
00387                   {
00388                         iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;//IMP__ATTRIBUTES;
00389                   }
00390             }
00391       }
00392 }
